com.scaleoutsoftware.soss.cache

Class ScaleoutCacheConfiguration<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.cache.configuration.MutableConfiguration<K,V>
      • com.scaleoutsoftware.soss.cache.ScaleoutCacheConfiguration<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the key in an entry stored in the ScaleoutCache
    V - the type of the value in an entry stored in the ScaleoutCache
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.cache.configuration.CompleteConfiguration<K,V>, javax.cache.configuration.Configuration<K,V>

    public class ScaleoutCacheConfiguration<K,V>
extends javax.cache.configuration.MutableConfiguration<K,V>
    Configuration implementation used to configure a ScaleoutCache.
    See Also:
